messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Hey, check this out! Look at the
luster of my Pokémon’s fur!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT: Hey, hey, did you take a good look?
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
The Veilstone Department Store is
pretty impressive!Did you know they even sell Poffins?
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I brushed my party a lot.
So we’d be ready for a rematch!
